head.title: School of Spiritual Foundation - Cohort 2 Examination

body.h2: SCHOOL OF SPIRITUAL FOUNDATION - COHORT 2 EXAMINATION
body.p: INSTRUCTIONS: Neatly underline the correct option or options where necessary: some questions may have more than one correct answer!

Essay Questions

div.label: 1. Explain the Salvation of man in the light of the 3 dimensions as revealed in the scriptures (Past, Present and Future)

2. If a Christian happens to be involved in an accident and dies immediately but just before the accident he cheated the bus driver in the payment of his transport fare. What would be his fate in eternity?
3. What are some of the significance of The Laying on of hands?

4. What is the fate of a Christian whose body was burnt to death as far as the resurrection is concerned; would he/she be able to rise again; especially as the remains of the body would have completely been dispersed?

5. Would a Christian be judged if he/she had to kill themself because they were being attacked by bandits/terrorist and were going to be gruesomely murdered, instead of watching that happen, decided to swallow poison?

6. In the light of the parameters of Judgement, would a Christian be Judged for standing against a thief and eventually killed him; the thief attempted to steal off him/her and was about to kill the Christian?
7. Why must a Christian evangelize? And when is the work of evangelism said to be completed for a Christian?
8. Differentiate between Soul Winning and Evangelism? And when is a soul said to be won?
9. Explain what it means to Live in view of eternity!
10. Is there a degree of sin that takes a man to Hell? If yes/no explain!
